change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Mission San Xavier del Bac diary and scrapbook 1861-1948
did.abstract: Holograph and typescript (photocopy) of Father Bonaventure's private diary and scrapbook describing early 1900's at the mission. Includes photographs of Tohono O'Odham Indians' life, housing, ceremonies. Early entries list baptisms.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Mission San Xavier del Bac diary and scrapbook (AZ 554). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Franciscan priest, historian and missionary, mainly to the Tohono O'Odham Indians at Mission San Xavier del Bac, Tucson, Arizona.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph and typescript (photocopy) of Father Bonaventure's private diary and scrapbook describing early 1900's at the mission. Includes photographs of Tohono O'Odham Indians' life, housing, ceremonies. Early entries list baptisms.
